channel.title: Comments on: Ecto 2.0.0-beta.0 is out!
channel.description: Plataformatec's place to talk about Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Elixir, and software engineering

item.title: By: Lin He
item.dc:creator: Lin He
item.description: Thanks for the hard work! Love Ecto.Multi :)
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the hard work! Love Ecto.Multi ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Vignesh Rajagopalan
item.dc:creator: Vignesh Rajagopalan
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2016/02/ecto-2-0-0-beta-0-is-out/comment-page-1/#comment-1576">josevalim</a>.
Figured that out. Thanks.
So basically, It used to be
setup tags do ... end
Now since there's no need to check on tags, it's just
setup do :ok = Ecto.Adapters.SQL.Sandbox.checkout(Demo.Repo) end
Just wanted to leave it here
item.content:encoded:
In reply to josevalim.

Figured that out. Thanks.

So basically, It used to be

setup tags do
…
end

Now since there’s no need to check on tags, it’s just

setup do
:ok = Ecto.Adapters.SQL.Sandbox.checkout(Demo.Repo)
end

Just wanted to leave it here

item.title: By: josevalim
item.dc:creator: josevalim
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2016/02/ecto-2-0-0-beta-0-is-out/comment-page-1/#comment-1570">Vanceone</a>.
Yes, it has been merged already.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Vanceone.

Yes, it has been merged already.

item.title: By: josevalim
item.dc:creator: josevalim
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2016/02/ecto-2-0-0-beta-0-is-out/comment-page-1/#comment-1574">Vignesh Rajagopalan</a>.
No, you need to call ":ok = Ecto.Adapters.SQL.Sandbox.checkout(Demo.Repo)" as shown above in every setup.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Vignesh Rajagopalan.

No, you need to call “:ok = Ecto.Adapters.SQL.Sandbox.checkout(Demo.Repo)” as shown above in every setup.

item.title: By: Vignesh Rajagopalan
item.dc:creator: Vignesh Rajagopalan
item.description:
Does this mean, the setup block in the *_case.ex files is no more necessary?
because the block in on the variable tags which is unused essentially.
item.content:encoded:
Does this mean, the setup block in the *_case.ex files is no more necessary?

because the block in on the variable tags which is unused essentially.

item.title: By: jamilabreu
item.dc:creator: jamilabreu
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2016/02/ecto-2-0-0-beta-0-is-out/comment-page-1/#comment-1571">jamilabreu</a>.
Heads up, also need to add:
{:ecto, github: "elixir-lang/ecto", override: true}
to mix.exs. Otherwise throws:
** (UndefinedFunctionError) undefined function XXXX.Repo.__adapter__/0
on create.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to jamilabreu.

Heads up, also need to add:

{:ecto, github: “elixir-lang/ecto”, override: true}

to mix.exs. Otherwise throws:

** (UndefinedFunctionError) undefined function XXXX.Repo.__adapter__/0

on create.
